item.title: Suzuki e-Access: India’s Next Big Family EV from a Trusted Giant
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Suzuki e-Access electric scooter launched! LFP battery for safety, 95km range & DC fast charging. Why this family-focused EV could redefine reliability in India's e2W market.

item.title: Why the Honda City Remains an Underrated Marvel on Indian Roads
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Honda City: India's most underrated sedan? 27 years of refinement, unmatched comfort & quiet reliability. Why this timeless icon still outclasses flashy rivals in 2025.

item.title: Renault India Revamps Strategy with New Design Center and Upcoming Models
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Renault India is launching 5 new cars, including Duster SUV & an EV! New design center, ₹5,000 Cr investment & more. Full details here

item.title: Maruti Suzuki eVX Unveiled: India’s Electric Future Rolls Out at Bharat Mobility Expo
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Maruti Suzuki eVX electric SUV unveiled! 500km range, panoramic sunroof & fast charging. Is this India's most practical EV? First look at Maruti's game-changing electric future.

item.title: honda-in-india-a-premium-legacy-losing-steam-or-a-silent-comeback
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Honda in India: Why the iconic City & Amaze are losing ground in the SUV era. Can Elevate & hybrid tech revive its premium appeal? Deep dive into Honda's strategy & future.

item.title: Baleno 4-Star Surprise, Honda City Hybrid Dilemma & Skoda CNG Plans: India’s Car Market in 2025
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: India's car market is changing! Safety ratings now matter, hybrids face reality checks & buyers demand transparency. Latest on Bharat NCAP, CNG trends & what really influences purchases.

item.title: INNOVA: The Unshakeable MPV Brand in India
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Toyota Innova: India's undisputed MPV king! From Crysta to HyCross, why this people-mover dominates with 15,000+ monthly sales. Legacy, reliability & why competitors can't match it.

item.title: Are Hybrid Cars Worth It in India? A Complete Cost-Benefit Breakdown
item.dc:creator: Ragavendran Ramesh
item.description: Hybrid cars in India: Do they really save money? We break down fuel efficiency, break-even costs & who should (or shouldn't) buy one. Strong vs mild hybrids explained!
